section.name: Project WONDER Home
section.p: Project WONDER is a collection of frameworks and tools for the WebObjects application server. It aims to fill some of the gaps left in the packaged product, as well as add some useful and powerful utilities for WebObjects developers.
Currently the project consists of two main frameworks, and several example applications:

dl.dd: Provides a rich set of tools and additions for use in WebObjects and EOF development.
Provides many extensions and enhancements to WebObjects' DirectToWeb functionality.

section.p: Please see our Sourceforge project page for access to the CVS source and for more information about joining Project WONDER.
You may also want to subscribe to the Project WONDER discussion list, which provides a forum for discussion of ongoing development and utilization of the Project WONDER codebase.
